title: Latest updates: Nottinghamshire Live on Thursday 23 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: storm doris closes parks and newark castle .
couple launch charity to help bereaved parents .
health inspectors release report into qmc a & e .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for nottinghamshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : winds to ease tonight
text: an amber warning for wind is valid until 20:00 , with rain and strong winds continuing to cause travel disruption .
wind and gusts will steadily ease over the course of this evening and overnight .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: travel : m1 closure causing problems on a610
text: heavy traffic on a610 outbound to m1 26 .
lanes closed on m1 between j25 & j26 due to unsafe overhead gantry
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: train to arrive 'a week next wednesday '
text: it 's going to take the head of bbc east midlands a long time to get home at this rate .
it may look like slomo but this is the actual speed my train has been doing .
current eta at home : a week next wednesday .
red cross parcel at next station .
will hold out hand you can catch it on way
at this speed you can jump on and hand it over
nice tracking shot though
turns out the ecml works well for that
here 's what you could have won in days gone by
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: long delays on m1 this afternoon
text: nottinghamshire fire and rescue service has tweeted that all lanes of the m1 southbound between junction 26 ( a610 ) and junction 25 ( a52 ) are now closed , as well as two lanes of the northbound carriageway while they clear hanging debris on an overhead gantry .
motorists have been warned to avoid the area as long delays are expected as we head into rush hour .
update : all lanes of the # m1 southbound between j26 and j25 have now been closed along with two lanes northbound ( 1/2 )
how long does it take to remove some hanging metal ? !
what is going on ?
hi robert , our crews closed the carriageway to ensure the safety of motorists , however lanes are expected to open shortly .
any indication of how long this will be for ?
hi ben , all lanes northbound are now open , with the southbound lanes expected to open shortly .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: train tickets valid tomorrow
text: train tickets valid tomorrow
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fallen tree causes delays near priory island
text: there was another lucky escape for a driver near priory island , wollaton , this afternoon as storm doris continues to rage .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: 'lucky escape ' for taxi driver as tree falls
text: stu walker was driving along wilford lane in west bridgford earlier when his dashboard camera captured a falling tree - narrowly missing a taxi .
he said : `` lucky escape for the silver taxi driver whose roof was severely dented just behind his head . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : alftreton road reopens
text: it had been closed after reports of glass falling from a derelict building .
alfreton road has now reopened to traffic in both directions
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

traffic is down to one lane between j26 ( a610 nottingham ) and j25 ( a52 nottingham ) because of debris hanging from an overhead gantry .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

text: there have been reports of panes of glass falling from a derelict building on alfreton road .
alfreton road still closed in both directions between boden street & highurst street due to unsafe building .
diversions in place
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

text: this person in hoveringham is n't complaining about the strong winds today .

text: we 're currently prioritising attendance at 35 known fallen trees across the county .
# stormdoris
author: Sandish Shoker

documents.title: traffic and travel : train services suspended
text: train services are being suspended between lincoln central and peterborough and lincoln and newark north gate because of the high winds .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: your photos : storm sunshine over market square
text: the weather has been miserable so far today , but it 's made for some stunning photos .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : fallen trees being cleared as storm hits
text: here 's a video of the tree in the meadows being cleared by nottingham city council staff earlier .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: why the name storm doris ?
text: i was a little baffled as to why today 's storm is called `` doris '' .
well , it seems `` doris '' was voted for by the public as part of the met office 's `` name our storms pilot scheme '' - which helped compile the list of storm names for 2016 to 2017 .
very straight-forward !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: farmer helps clear fallen tree
text: the a617 , which was shut earlier this morning , is now open .
the a617 at kirklington is now reopen thanks to the efforts of a local farmer in assisting highways staff to remove the tree !
# stormdoris
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: strongest gusts so far at airport
text: mr godby said the highest gusts in our region so far have been recorded in the past hour , with 67mph recorded at east midlands airport .
you can watch for peak gusts here .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: storm doris : wind expected to get worse
text: steven godby , from the weather station , told us the wind is as strong as expected - and it will get worse .
he said : `` the highest recorded wind speed for today so far is showing as 79.81km/h which is pretty much bang on 50mph .
`` i 'd expect that to be rising in the next hour or two though . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: weather station in action
text: i was out at nottingham trent university 's weather station at their brackenhurst campus this morning .
dr jill showed me how they will be measuring the wind and rain today .
author: Hayley Compton
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: tree in the meadows being cleared
text: the tree in wilford crescent west is already being cleared up by nottingham city council .
the damage to the car is minimal .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: inspectors criticise 'end of life ' care
text: the cqc report also found the hospital 's end of life care needed some improvement .
inspectors said staff were not given regular training and the hospital trust did not have an overall strategy for end of life care .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: nottingham a & e department 'needs improvement '
text: nottingham 's queen 's medical centre has been told its emergency department needs improvement .

inspectors from the care quality commission have published their report after they found services were `` good '' when it came to caring - but the department needed to improve on safety and `` responsiveness '' .
inspectors said they found staff cared for patients with `` compassion , patience and kindness , '' but highlighted issues with overcrowding and unrelenting pressure .
the trust that runs the hospital said they 're using the findings to help make their improvements .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: tree lands on car in the meadows
text: just as one fallen tree is cleared we 've been told of another .
a bbc radio nottingham listener has called to say wilford crescent west in the meadows is blocked at the corner of glapton road where a tree has landed on a car .
police are at the scene .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : sneinton road reopens
text: the tree has been removed from sneinton boulevard .
the road has reopened .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: storm doris : more attractions close
text: storm doris has closed wollaton park and nottingham castle today too .
please note : due to high winds , newstead abbey grounds will be closed until further notice for safety reasons .
sorry for any inconvenience !
# stormdoris is hitting us quite hard right now here in the city too .
stay safe everyone !
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: sneinton road closed by fallen tree
text: here is a photo of that tree down on sneinton boulevard .
the road is still shut and people are being told to find alternative routes .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : fallen tree in sneinton
text: sneinton boulevard is closed in both directions at the junction with port arthur road because of a fallen down tree .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: your questions : what about the city ?
text: just to give you a comparison , the average age population for the whole of the uk is 40 years old .
and while i was counting figures , i had a look at the breakdown of the age population in nottingham city too .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: your questions : age breakdown
text: and if you want more of a breakdown of what the population looks like across nottinghamshire , here it is broken down into age categories :
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: your questions : what is the age population of nottinghamshire ?
text: asim wahid used your questions to ask : `` what is the age population in nottinghamshire ? ''

he said he was prompted to ask the question after a lengthy debate with a friend from banbury about how many young people there were in the county , and said he `` was intrigued to see what our population looks like in regards to age '' .
it 's taken me a day of going through a lot of figures from the office of national statistics ( ons ) , but i have found the average age of someone from nottinghamshire is 41.5 years .
these figures are from 2015 .
the ones for 2016 wo n't be available until later this year .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: storm doris : attractions closed
text: we told you yesterday that sherwood pines forest park and rufford abbey country park were closing today because of storm doris .
newark castle , bestwood country park and clumber park have announced they are also shut today because of the expected strong winds .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: storm doris : trains delayed and cancelled
text: not looking good on the trains right now .
author: Sarah Teale
East Midlands Today reporter at Leicester railway station

documents.title: overhead wire damage stops london trains
text: east midlands trains tweets
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest midfielder : mood in camp is 'good '
text: nottingham forest midfielder ben osborn said gary brazil and jack lester have helped the forest squad pull together and move in the right direction .
despite three defeats on the spin , the reds have moved six points clear of the relegation zone since the pair took charge - and osborn said the mood in the camp is good .
author: Christian Hewgill
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: watch : rainbow babies offer 'hope and light '
text: mrs pearson said the charity uses the phrase `` rainbow babies '' to describe children who are born after parents have lost a child .
here she is explaining what inspired her to set up the charity .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: charity helps bereaved parents
text: emma pearson and her husband matthew had stillborn twins in 2011 .
on the due date for the twins , she fell pregnant again and the worksop couple now have two children .
mrs pearson 's experience inspired her to set up a charity called `` joel '' which offers support to bereaved parents .
through the charity they have raised £ 40,000 which they have used to redevelop a family bereavement suite at bassetlaw hospital .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : today 's weather as storm doris hits
text: it 's a wet and windy start to the day because of storm doris .
the rain will slowly clear as the day goes by , however the winds will strengthen until the early afternoon with gusts of 50 to 60mph possible for a time and up to 80mph over higher ground .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Radio Nottingham sports reporter

documents.title: your rainbow over lambley
text: this lovely double rainbow over lambley this morning was sent into weather presenter charlie slater .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : a606 now clear
text: problems on the a606 melton road have been resolved fairly quickly .
the tree has been removed .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : tree down on a606
text: some of the travel disruption expected to occur today has already started .
a tree has fallen on a606 melton road , blocking the road in both directions close to the junction with the a46 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: we 're expecting some heavy rain and some very strong winds today as storm doris hits the region .
in other news , we will also hear from parents who are using rainbow symbols to remember their children they lost through miscarriage or stillbirth .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online
